articles.description: The Income Tax Department has said that the world’s biggest two-wheeler manufacturer – Hero MotoCorp has made over Rs 1,000 crore in bogus expenses. The department has also found multiple violations including Rs 100 crore in the transaction for a farmhouse in…

articles.title: These large cap fund winners delivered up to 23% returns in FY21-22 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Despite fierce competition from passive funds, some large cap mutual fund schemes outperformed markets and peers

articles.title: Effective April 1, your investments in mutual funds through stockbrokers and online platforms may need to... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In the case of stock exchange platforms the money will reach fund houses via clearing corporations. If you are an investor transacting in exchange-traded funds (ETFs), nothing changes for you.
articles.content: Beginning April 1, it might take a little longer for your money to reach your fund house if you invest through a stockbroker or an online platform. This is due to a change in rules announced by the c… [+6790 chars]
